players.name: Alice
memory:
Diana: "I am the detective and I found Alice is the mafioso.
"
You: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to be cautious and consider the implications of Diana's revelation."
Diana: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. I urge everyone, especially Alice, to be cautious and not make any rash decisions based on the current information."
Bob: "Bob is still trying to figure out the situation. I will keep an eye on everyone and await more information before making any conclusions."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
